survey_name: Employee Experience with AI-Powered Performance Feedback Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and usability of AI-powered performance feedback tools in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How often do you receive performance feedback through AI-powered tools in your organization?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify response collection. Ensure the options cover the most common feedback frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you receive performance feedback through AI-powered tools in your organization?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered performance feedback features do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent answers 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select multiple features. Ensure the options reflect common AI feedback features.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered performance feedback features do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent answers 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the performance feedback provided by AI-powered tools?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent answers 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the performance feedback provided by AI-powered tools?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent answers 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered performance feedback tools used in your organization?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the response box is large enough for detailed answers.

questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify response collection. The options should cover a range of potential impacts.
